title: News24.com | Lockdown slapdown: Stella Ndabeni-Abrahams pleads guilty, fined R1 000 for breaking law
description: Communications Minister Stella Ndabeni-Abrahams has pleaded guilty and paid a R1 000 fine for contravening lockdown regulations, the NPA has confirmed.
content:
Communications Minister Stella Ndabeni-Abrahams has pleaded guilty and paid a R1 000 fine for contravening lockdown regulations, the NPA confirmed on Wednesday. 
Earlier this month, President Cyril Ramaphosa placed Ndabeni-Abrahams on special leave and direc… [+1613 chars]
